name: Apparel and Accessories
description: Encompasses clothing, footwear, and fashion accessories for all demographics, driving fashion trends and seasonal demand.

name: Home Furnishings and Decor
description: Covers furniture, home textiles, and decorative items, catering to evolving lifestyle and interior design preferences.

name: Electronics and Appliances
description: Includes consumer electronics, household appliances, and smart home devices, reflecting technological advancements and connectivity trends.

name: Beauty and Personal Care
description: Encompasses cosmetics, skincare, and grooming products, addressing diverse beauty standards and wellness concerns.

name: Food and Beverage
description: Covers packaged foods, beverages, and specialty items, responding to nutritional trends and diverse culinary preferences.

name: Toys and Games
description: Includes traditional toys, board games, and electronic gaming products, catering to entertainment and educational needs across age groups.

name: Sporting Goods and Outdoor Equipment
description: Encompasses sports gear, fitness equipment, and outdoor recreation products, supporting active lifestyles and adventure pursuits.

name: Health and Wellness Products
description: Covers over-the-counter medications, supplements, and fitness trackers, addressing growing health consciousness and self-care trends.

name: Pet Supplies
description: Includes pet food, accessories, and care products, reflecting the increasing humanization of pets and premium pet care trends.

name: Stationery and Office Supplies
description: Encompasses writing instruments, paper products, and office accessories, serving both personal and professional organizational needs.
